revised_title: Human IFN-α Gene Structure and Expression
tldr: The article discusses the structure and expression of human IFN-α genes. The authors describe the process of cloning the IFN-α cDNA and the identification of different IFN-α cDNAs with distinct target cell specificities. They also explore the classification of IFN-α genes into two major subfamilies and their relationship with other genes in higher organisms. The study provides insights into the development of interferons in E. coli and the expression of the chromosomal gene for HuIFN-α in mouse L cells.
